items.title: 1 Super Stock That Could Join Nvidia, Apple, Microsoft, Alphabet, Amazon, and Meta in the $1 Trillion Club
items.description: The U.S. economy has produced the world's most valuable companies for more than a century.  United States Steel became the first $1 billion company in 1901, and 117 years later in 2018, Apple became the first enterprise to achieve a valuation of $1 trillion.  Apple remains the world's largest company with a market capitalization of $3.3 trillion.

items.title: Trump Trade: Binance founder denies report on Trump talks
items.description: Catch up on the top industries and stocks that were impacted, or were predicted to be impacted, by the comments, actions and policies of President Donald Trump with this daily recap compiled by The Fly: BINANCE FOUNDER DENIES REPORT: On Thursday, The Wall Street Journal’s Rebecca Ballhaus, Patricia Kowsmann, Angus Berwick, Josh Dawsey and Caitlin Ostroff crypto exchange Binance, citing people familiar with the matter.
